verbose_text: Phosphorylated PhoB activates expression of the phoBR operon, as well as other genes that are responsible for phosphorus assimilation, including phoA, encoding an alkaline phosphatase and the phn operon encoding phosphonate utilization genes (XREF_FIG).
evidence: Phosphorylated PhoB activates expression of the phoBR operon, as well as other genes that are responsible for phosphorus assimilation, including phoA, encoding an alkaline phosphatase and the phn operon
